TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectoryEntry extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 類別會封裝 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中的節點或物件。

span.span: The class encapsulates a node or object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別用於繫結至物件，或讀取及更新屬性。Use this class for binding to objects, or reading and updating attributes. 以及協助程式類別提供的支援生命週期管理和瀏覽的方法。, along with helper classes, provides support for life-cycle management and navigation methods. 其中包括建立、 刪除、 重新命名、 移動一個子節點，及列舉子系。These include creating, deleting, renaming, moving a child node, and enumerating children. 在您修改節點之後，您必須認可您的變更，使其儲存至樹狀結構。After you modify a node, you must commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. 可用來從結構描述項目的存取規則的項目和部分，而不是全部的資訊。 can be used to access regular entries and some, but not all, information from schema entries. Active Directory 網域服務階層包含最多幾個數千個節點。The Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy contains up to several thousand nodes. 每個節點表示的物件，例如網路印表機或網域中的使用者。Each node represents an object, such as a network printer or a user in a domain. 公司網路不斷變更的新員工僱用，並新增網路印表機和電腦 之類的物件。Corporate networks constantly change as new employees are hired and objects such as network printers and computers are added. Active Directory 服務介面 (ADSI) 技術提供以程式設計方式將這些物件加入至樹狀目錄的方式。Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) technology provides ways to programmatically add these objects to the directory tree. 若要建立的目錄項目階層架構中，使用屬性。To create a directory entry in the hierarchy, use the property. 屬性是集合，可提供方法，讓您將節點加入至您目前繫結至父節點正下方的集合。The property is a collection that provides an method, through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to. 將節點加入至集合中，您必須指定新節點的名稱以及您想要與此節點關聯的結構描述範本的名稱。When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node. 比方說，您可能要將新電腦新增至階層中使用標題為 「 電腦 」 的結構描述。For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy. 這個類別也包含快取的屬性，可用於最佳化網路流量。This class also contains attribute caching, which can be useful for optimizing network traffic. 若要使用屬性快取，請參閱屬性。To use attribute caching, see the property. 與相關聯的類別元件可以搭配任何 Active Directory 網域服務的服務提供者。The classes associated with the component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers. 有些目前的提供者是 Internet Information Services (IIS)、 輕量型目錄存取通訊協定 (LDAP)、 Novell NetWare 目錄服務 (NDS) 和 WinNT。Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT. > [!NOTE] > 這被假設您有 Active Directory 網域服務的一般知識，才能使用這個類別。It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using this class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間概觀。For more information, see the namespace overview.

span.span: The name of the native Active Directory Domain Services object to bind to.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體繫結至指定的原生 Active Directory 網域服務物件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that binds to the specified native Active Directory Domain Services object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓程式使用的方法和屬性類別上實作 IADs 介面，透過原生 API 的原生 Active Directory 網域服務物件。This constructor enables a program to use the methods and properties of the class on a native Active Directory Domain Services object that implements the IADs interface through a native API. 如需有關 IADs 介面的詳細資訊，請參閱主題[IADs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) MSDN library [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Children As DirectoryEntries

summary.span: 取得 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中這個節點的子項目。

span.span: Gets the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

value.span: 物件，其中包含 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中這個節點的子項目。

span.span: A object containing the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子系項目是這個節點的直接子系。The child entries are only the immediate children of this node. 使用這個屬性，擷取，或在階層中建立的目錄項目。Use this property to find, retrieve, or create a directory entry in the hierarchy. 這個屬性是集合，以及一般的反覆項目功能中，提供方法讓您將節點加入至您目前繫結至父節點正下方的集合。This property is a collection that, along with the usual iteration capabilities, provides an method through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to. 將節點加入至集合中，您必須指定新節點的名稱以及您想要與此節點關聯的結構描述範本的名稱。When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node. 比方說，您可能要將新電腦新增至階層中使用標題為 「 電腦 」 的結構描述。For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，會變更本機快取。By default, changes are made locally to a cache. 您修改或新增節點之後，您必須呼叫; 方法來認可您的變更，使其儲存至樹狀結構。After you modify or add a node, you must call the method to commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree. 如果您呼叫再呼叫，任何未認可的變更至屬性快取將會遺失。If you call before calling , any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並方法，而屬性。For more information, see the and methods, and the property.

span.span: To retrieve the child entries.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉 物件，並釋放與這個元件相關聯的任何系統資源。

span.span: Closes the object and releases any system resources that are associated with this component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來釋放 unmanaged 的系統資源，而不需等待記憶體回收。Call this method to release unmanaged system resources, without waiting for garbage collection. 呼叫之後，在任何作業可能會引發例外狀況。Following a call to , any operations on the might raise exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CommitChanges() cil managed

summary.span: 將目錄項目的變更儲存至基礎目錄存放區。

span.span: Saves changes that are made to a directory entry to the underlying directory store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，屬性的變更在本機的快取，而且第一次讀取之後，會快取讀取的屬性值。By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 快取所做的變更包括屬性變更，以及呼叫（如果這是新建立的項目）。Changes made to the cache include changes to the properties as well as calls to (if this is the newly created entry). > [!CAUTION] > 如果您呼叫再呼叫，任何未認可的變更至屬性快取將會遺失。If you call before calling , any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. ## 安全性Security - 使用讀取、 寫入、 刪除、 變更和新增至 Active Directory 網域服務階層的類別。Use the class for reading, writing, deleting, changing, and adding to the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 相關聯的列舉型別： 。Associated enumeration: .

span.span: To commit the changes.

summary.span: 建立這個項目的複本。

span.span: Creates a copy of this entry.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DeleteTree() cil managed

summary.span: 從 Active Directory 網域服務階層刪除這個項目及其整個子樹狀結構。

span.span: Deletes this entry and its entire subtree from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Active Directory 服務介面 (ADSI) 系統提供提供者只輕量型目錄存取通訊協定 (LDAP) 目前支援這項作業。Of the Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) system-supplied providers, only the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) currently supports this operation. > [!CAUTION] > 會刪除 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中的項目 」 和 「 及其整個樹狀子目錄。The entry and its entire subtree are deleted from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. ## 安全性Security - 使用從 Active Directory 網域服務階層刪除項目。Use for deleting entries from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 相關聯的列舉型別： 。Associated enumeration: .

span.span: The specified is not a container.

permission.span: 若要刪除的項目及其子系。

span.span: To delete the entry and its children.

abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 處置 所使用的資源 (記憶體除外)。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) that are used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個物件參考。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this object references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object. 如需詳細資訊並方法，請參閱[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information about the and methods, see [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NativeObject As Object
public: property System::Object ^ NativeObject { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得原生 Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) 物件。

span.span: Gets the native Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) object.
The native ADSI object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性會實作 IADs 介面，當您想要使用的 COM 介面將原生 Active Directory 網域服務物件轉型。Use this property to cast the native Active Directory Domain Services object, which implements the IADs interface, when you want to use a COM interface. 如需有關 IADs 介面的詳細資訊，請參閱主題[IADs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) MSDN library [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp)。For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp). 這個物件是進階的案例無法解決的單獨的類別。This object is for advanced scenarios that cannot be accomplished with the classes alone. 若要使用它，您需要從 IADs 家族中，匯入其中一個 COM 介面，則這個屬性轉換成該介面。To use it, you need to import one of the COM interfaces from the IADs family, then cast this property to that interface.

member this.Path : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path for this .
The path of this object.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可唯一識別網路環境中的此項目。The property uniquely identifies this entry in a networked environment. 此項目可以永遠擷取使用此。This entry can always be retrieved using this . 設定擷取新的項目，從目錄儲存; 它不會變更目前繫結項目的路徑。Setting the retrieves a new entry from the directory store; it does not change the path of the currently bound entry. 與相關聯的類別元件可以搭配任何 Active Directory 網域服務的服務提供者。The classes associated with the component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers. 有些目前的提供者是 Internet Information Services (IIS)、 輕量型目錄存取通訊協定 (LDAP)、 Novell NetWare 目錄服務 (NDS) 和 WinNT。Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT. > [!NOTE] > 區段，識別提供者 （「://"之前） 會區分大小寫。The section of the that identifies the provider (precedes "://") is case-sensitive. 例如，"LDAP: / /"或"WinNT: / /"。For example, "LDAP://" or "WinNT://". 語法屬性會根據提供者而異。The syntax for the property varies according to the provider. 以下是一些常見的情節：Some common scenarios are: WinNTWinNT - 連接到電腦上的群組。Connect to a group on a computer. 例如，"WinNT: / /**\<網域名稱 > /\<電腦名稱 > /\<群組名稱 >**"。For example, "WinNT://**\/\/\**". 如果您要連接到本機電腦上，「 WinNT: / /**\<電腦名稱 > /\<群組名稱 >**"。If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\/\**". - 連接到電腦上的使用者。Connect to a user on a computer. 例如，"WinNT: / /**\<網域名稱 > /\<電腦名稱 > /\<使用者名稱 >**"。For example, "WinNT://**\/\/\**". 如果您要連接到本機電腦上，「 WinNT: / /**\<電腦名稱 > /\<使用者名稱 >**"。If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\/\**". - 連接到電腦上的服務。Connect to services on a computer. 例如，"WinNT: / /**\<網域名稱 > /\<電腦名稱 > /\<服務名稱 >**"。For example, "WinNT://**\/\/\**". 如果您要連接到本機電腦上，「 WinNT: / /**\<電腦名稱 > /\<服務名稱 >**"。If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\/\**". - 探索網路上的所有網域。Discover all domains on the network. 例如，"WinNT:"即可找到網域列舉此項目的子系。For example, "WinNT:" The domains can be found by enumerating the children of this entry. LDAPLDAP - 連線到網域中的群組。Connect to a group in a domain. 例如，"ldap://cn =\<群組名稱 >，CN =\<使用者 >，DC =\<網域元件 >，DC =\<網域元件 >，..."。For example, "LDAP://CN=\, CN =\, DC=\, DC=\,...". - 連線到網域中的使用者。Connect to a user in a domain. 例如，"ldap://cn =\<完整使用者名稱 >，CN =\<使用者 >，DC =\<網域元件 >，DC =\<網域元件 >，..."。For example, "LDAP://CN=\, CN=\, DC=\, DC=\,...". - 連線到網域中的電腦。Connect to computers in a domain. 例如，"ldap://cn =\<電腦名稱 >，CN =\<電腦 >，DC =\<網域元件 >，DC =\<網域元件 >，..."。For example, "LDAP://CN=\, CN=\, DC=\, DC=\,...". IISIIS - 連接到 Web 目錄。Connect to a Web directory. 例如，"IIS://LocalHost/W3SVC/1/ROOT/\"。For example, "IIS://LocalHost/W3SVC/1/ROOT/\". 若要繫結至目前的網域，使用 LDAP，使用路徑"//rootdse"，則取得預設命名內容，然後重新繫結項目。To bind to the current domain using LDAP, use the path "LDAP://RootDSE", then get the default naming context and rebind the entry. 例如: For example: ```csharp String str = ent.Properties["defaultNamingContext"][0]; DirectoryEntry domain = new DirectoryEntry("LDAP://" + str); ``` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱您的提供者和主題的文件[使用 Active Directory 服務介面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/using_adsi.asp)MSDN library [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the documentation for your provider and the topic [Using Active Directory Service Interfaces](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/using_adsi.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Properties As PropertyCollection

summary.span: 取得這個 物件的 Active Directory 網域服務屬性。

span.span: Gets the Active Directory Domain Services properties for this object.

value.span: 物件，其中包含在這個項目上設定的屬性。

span.span: A object that contains the properties that are set on this entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性未初始化，呼叫 ADSI 介面[IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx)方法來擷取快取中的值。If the property is not initialized, calls the ADSI interface [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) method to retrieve the value from the cache. 如果尚未載入基礎快取， [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx)隱含地呼叫[IADs::GetInfo](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx)。If the underling cache has not been loaded, [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) implicitly calls [IADs::GetInfo](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx). 這個方法會載入支援尚未設定基礎目錄存放區快取中的屬性的值。This method loads the values of the supported properties that have not been set in the cache from the underlying directory store. 後續呼叫擷取快取中的屬性值。Subsequent calls to retrieves the property values in the cache only. 若要控制載入屬性快取，請呼叫。To control property cache loading, call . **附註**屬性不支援搭配 Active Directory Client Extension (DSClient) [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/includes/winnt4family-md.md)]。**Note** The property is not supported for use with the Active Directory Client Extension (DSClient) for [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/includes/winnt4family-md.md)].

span.span: To retrieve the properties.

summary.span: 將這個 物件的屬性值載入屬性快取中。

span.span: Loads the property values for this object into the property cache.

summary.span: 將這個 物件的屬性值載入屬性快取中。

span.span: Loads the property values for this object into the property cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 屬性快取任何未認可的變更將會遺失。Any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. 使用方法，將目錄存放區的變更。Use the method to persist changes to the directory store.

permission.span: 若要重新整理屬性快取。

span.span: To refresh the property cache.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UsePropertyCache { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UsePropertyCache : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在每一項作業之後，是否應該認可快取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache should be committed after each operation.

value.span: 如果在每一項作業之後不應該認可快取，則為 否則為 。

span.span: if the cache should not be committed after each operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，屬性的變更在本機的快取，而且第一次讀取之後，會快取讀取的屬性值。By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read. 當屬性是`true`，存取物件的屬性會比較快。When the property is `true`, access to the object's properties is faster. 這個設定設為`false`會導致快取在每個作業之後進行認可。Setting this to `false` will cause the cache to be committed after each operation. 如果屬性是`true`和您想要快取的認可變更，呼叫方法。If the property is `true` and you want to commit cached changes, call the method. 若要進行目錄變更之後，請更新快取中的值，呼叫方法。To update values in the cache after changes to the directory are made, call the method. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您呼叫再呼叫，任何未認可的變更至屬性快取將會遺失。If you call before calling , any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. > [!NOTE] > Internet Information Services (IIS) 提供者不支援每個作業後認可快取。The Internet Information Services (IIS) provider does not support committing the cache after each operation.
